name: book.extended_drawers.patchouli.text7
pages: @item@Access Points@! allow inserting items to the whole $(l:simple_networks)network@!, automatically finding the right drawer, see $(l:insertion_order)this@! for ordering. @p@They also act as an interface for other mods to access the network, see $(l:mod_interoperability)this@! for more info.
